original_text: the one who struck the blow will not be held liable if the other can get up and walk around outside with a staff; however, the guilty party must pay the injured person for any loss of time and see that the victim is completely healed.
korean_text: 지팡이를 짚고 일어나 걸으면 그를 친 자가 형벌은 면하되 그간의 손해를 배상하고 그가 완치되게 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: the one who struck the blow
if the other can get up
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 다른 사람이 일어날 수 있다면

sentences.original_text: and walk around outside with a staff
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 지팡이를 짚고 밖에서 걸어 다닐 수 있다면

sentences.original_text: the injured person for any loss of time
and see that the victim is completely healed
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 피해자가 완전히 치유되도록 보살펴야 한다
